item.title: Woman arrested for hiding razor blades in loaves of bread at Walmart stores
item.description: A woman who allegedly pushed razor blades into loaves of bread at two Biloxi, Mississippi, Walmart stores has been arrested

item.title: World shares gain, while oil prices jump as Trump orders a blockade of oil tankers to Venezuela

item.title: Japan's exports rise 6% in November as shipments to the US bounce back
item.description: Japan has reported its exports climbed 6% in November from a year earlier as shipments to the United States rose for the first time since March
